alert.note: Alert for NCC000 (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued May 12 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...EAS Child Abduction Emergency... The following message is transmitted at the request of FL. ...THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION....THE CALDWELL COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR ZOEY GRACE TENIENTE. ZOEY IS A 10 YEAR OLD HISPANIC FEMALE APPROXIMATELY 4 FOOT 10 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 110 POUNDS. SHE HAS BROWN HAIR AND BROWN EYES. ZOEY WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A PINK SHORT SLEEVE SHIRT BLACK PANTS AND WHITE SHOES. THE ABDUCTOR JAN MAIN BRYANT IS DESCRIBED AS A WHITE FEMALE 5 FOOT 6 INCHES TALL WITH BROWN HAIR. LAST SEEN WEARING GLASSES A RED SHIRT AND BLACK PANTS. THEY WERE LAST SEEN LEAVING 2969 PLAYMORE BEACH ROAD IN MORGANTON NORTH CAROLINA IN A OLDER MODEL RED TWO DOOR HATCHBACK WITH JESUS SAVES WRITTEN IN BLACK SPRAY PAINT ALL OVER THE VEHICLE. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION CALL CALDWELL COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IMMEDIATELY AT 828 758 2324 OR CALL 911 OR STAR 47. THIS IS AN AMBER ALERT....
